name: Portal Command
description:
A game for OST Jam Vol. 3, featuring "Music To Save The Universe To" by Track

Playable on pretty much any browser (though it doesn't seem to like Firefox as much as Chrome/Safari). On mobile devices, use the on-screen DPAD + A buttons. On PCs, use the arrow keys + Space.

For more details, choose Help from the main menu. You'll figure it out!
